ProductInfo.Features:
The camera has 420 TV lines resolution with a 1/4 inch CCD color image sensor.
The camera has a high resistance to shock and vibrations and is not affected by distortions from magnetic fields.
There are 22 infrared LEDs which provide light that is invisible to the human eye but will illuminate up to 50 feet in total darkness.
The camera is very easy to install - just plug and play - but if help is needed call our friendly technicians and they will be glad to help.
To make a complete installation, add the CB120BP - Clover 120 Feet BNC Video and Power Extension Cable and the ADT121000 - Clover 12VDC 1A Regulated Switching Mode Power Supply.
ProductInfo.Name: Clover DC359 Indoor Day/Night 420TVL Color Dome Camera with 22 Infrared LEDs that Produce 50-Feet of Night Vision (Black)
